name: FlexibleSpaceBar
desc: The part of a Material Design [AppBar] that expands, collapses, and stretches.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary contents of the flexible space bar when expanded.

fields.name: centerTitle
fields.desc: Whether the title should be centered.

fields.name: titlePadding
fields.desc: Defines how far the [title] is inset from either the widget's bottom-left or its center.

fields.name: expandedTitleScale
fields.desc: Defines how much the title is scaled when the FlexibleSpaceBar is expanded due to the user scrolling downwards. The title is scaled uniformly on the x and y axes while maintaining its bottom-left position (bottom-center if [centerTitle] is true).
